document.full_text: in the charged world of top-level soccer, a royal wedding tribute sewn onto the shirt of the glasgow rangers captain david weir on saturday could have been viewed as a political statement.
document.title: sometimes a shirt, or a flag, says something more
lines_and_colors: in the charged world of top-level soccer, a royal wedding tribute sewn onto the shirt of the glasgow rangers captain david weir on saturday could have been viewed as a political statement.
